author: @mislavbilic3089
text: I do not understand why are people talking so positively about this video, I do not think that the vast majority of the viewers are thinking about seriously kickstarting their DA career. The creator Luke spent 13min talking mostly about some potential AI to use, most of which was either canceled, or you need to pay a large sum (which the creator Luke doesn't recommend), or the creator Luke is not even sure in the first place which one to pick. He just talks about sticking with his channel to find out which one he likes. Totally useless information without any real plan. Just Luke talking extensively about his knowledge to establish himself as a pro. This is fine, but if the video is titled "How I'd Learn to be a Data Analyst in 2024" then give me real guidance. This video should be titled "Interesting surveys about in-demand DA skills and how to potentially improve them". 100% misleading title
